mapper.select: select t.issue_id as id,t.loan_id,t.cur_date, t.issue_type as exception_type,t.issue_time as issue_time, t.handle_status as handle_status,tos.vbs_bid as vbs_id ,t.handle_person,t.handle_time,t.handle_msg,t.issue_msg as exception_msg from (select * from t_account_issue where (handle_status = 0 or handle_status = 1) and cur_date >= #{beginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cur_date <= #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) t left join t_order tor on tor.bd_loan_id = t.loan_id left join t_order_status tos on tos.order_id = tor.order_id union select t.id,'' as loan_id,t.cur_date,t.exception_type,t.issue_time,t.handle_status as handle_status,'' as vbs_bid ,handle_person,t.handle_time,t.handle_msg,t.exception_msg as exception_msg from t_reconciliation_exception_record t where (t.handle_status = 0 or t.handle_status = 1) and cur_date >= #{beginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cur_date <= #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select.if: select * from t_repay_plan t where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select * from t_loan_repay t where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select * from t_repay_item t where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.update: update t_order_status t set t.order_status = #{order_status,jdbcType=TINYINT} , update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where t.vbs_bid =#{vbs_bid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update t_account_status t set t.handle_status =1 , t.update_time = now() where t.loan_id=#{loanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.issue_type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR};

update t_credit_quota tcq inner join ( select tor.cust_id,tor.amount from t_order tor where tor.order_id =( select tos.order_id from t_order_status tos where tos.vbs_bid =#{vbsBid,jdbcType=INTEGER}))tmp on (tmp.cust_id = tcq.cust_id and tcq.quota_status = 1) set tcq.frozen_account = tcq.frozen_account-tmp.amount,tcq.update_time=#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.select: select * from t_loan_operation_record t where t.vbs_bid =#{vbsBid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update t_order_status t set t.vbs_notify_number =#{noifyNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER} where t.vbs_bid =#{vbsBid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
